subject: AI & Agents
title: Change Management: Getting Teams to Adopt AI Tools
description: A micro-lesson that makes Change Management: Getting Teams to Adopt AI Tools usable.

hook.text: You built an amazing AI tool. Nobody on the team uses it. The problem isn't the toolâ€”it's adoption.

buildup.text: Change management guides people through the transition from old workflows to AI-enhanced ones.

discovery.text: Steps: demonstrate value early, train champions, address fears, and iterate on feedback.

twist.text: Fear of replacement is the biggest blocker. Frame AI as augmentation, not automation of jobs.

climax.text: Embed AI into existing workflows rather than creating separate AI tools nobody visits.

punchline.text: The best AI tool is the one people actually use.

quiz.question: What is the biggest blocker to AI adoption in teams?
